titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 1-(4,6-dimethoxypyrimidin-2-yl)-3-Y2-(dimethylcarbamoyl)phen lsufamoyl? urea.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 12/17/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 1-(4,6-dimethoxypyrimidin-2-yl)-3-Y2-(dimethylcarbamoyl)phen lsufamoyl? urea.
